comment: Professor Ressor is nice, passionate about history and gives great lectures, but they are really long. Tests are extremely hard. I wish he offered a study guide or more study materials because its often hard to know what exactly to study for exams since there is SO much information in lectures. I honestly wouldn't recommend unless you love history.

Make sure to do his work in advance (1-2 days before due). He has writing assignments which are not graded that hard as long as the material talks about what he wants. The lecture videos aren't required for you to watch but he does go into some depth, the online work does a good job of that. Use quizlet to help you study because the tests are HARD!

I thought this online class would be super easy for some reason but I was mistaken. The powerpoint lectures were all extremely boring and long. The work itself isn't hard, however it's not super easy. If you work at it, I'm sure you can get an A in this class.

He doesn't require attendance but everything that will be on the lecture quiz's and exam will be discussed in class. He doesn't post his lecture's online either. He's kinda funny and he makes it easier for you to understand the material. Every week is a new reading assignment and every other week is a lecture quiz.

Absolutely loved this professor, he is super lecture heavy though. I dont normally enjoy history but I really enjoyed this class. He tells it like a story which I love. You do have to pay attention and his quizzes are based on what he says in class which isnt on the PowerPoints.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures--Lecture heavy

comment: Poor communicator but a pretty easy class overall

Ressor is actually a pretty good teacher and he makes a lot of jokes. His powerpoints are not detailed so you have to watch his lecture videos to get a better understanding. He has 5 test including the final, a quiz over his videos and 1 reading assignment (both) due every Sunday and a Critical thinking assignment once a month.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Accessible outside class--Lecture heavy

comment: He is great. The tests can be a little challenging, but he tells you everything you need to know, just pay attention.
Takes attendance everyday, not because it is mandatory, but he is willing boost your grade up one or two points if he sees you go to class. Tells a story, not just a lecture. Great man

About the easiest class ever and professor Reesor is a pretty nice guy. I went to class maybe a total of 8-10 times and got an A. 4 tests all are online, hw that correlates with the book online, and a paper. The lectures aren't too bad and he is willing to work with you if you show initiative. Overall an east A if you do the hw online

Super easy class. Reesor makes history entertaining. He's really passionate about it which helps keep you awake. There are a lot of online geography assignments, but very easy. Just Google a map of each continent and you will be good to go. Highly recommended.

He is by far the best professor I've ever had. i came into this class HATING history and he makes you enjoy it way more. He gives you a lot of chances to bring your grade up with reading assignment. His tests are kind of hard but study and you'll be okay. OUr last 2 tests out of 5 are online though which is awesome. love him.

I HATED history prior to taking this class. He makes it fun and interesting; more than just remembering names & dates. All test material comes from his Powerpoints. Rarely used the book. This professor is soooo AWESOME!

He is very easy. He did NOT assign a text book for the class, everything was from his powerpoints. Had online test, one big project, one big paper, and the final. I personally found the class a bit boring, but its history. He is a good teacher who makes the material somewhat relatable and understandable. I would reccommend him!

He makes history interesting!! the book helps but he doesn't always encourage you to go by the book but by his powerpoints. Tests are posted online!! so basically tests are objective! If you pay attention during class and take notes, the online tests turn out easy for you. Has a very professional approach i must say! Easy A+!!!
I never had an interest in History, especially early civilization, however, he makes it interesting.  He deserves more respect than the 250 size class gives him.  Awesome instructor!
LOVED HIM! Easy to understand and fun. If you come to class and take notes, you'll get a good grade!
Freakin awesome teacher. SO easy to understand and SO understanding. Very flexible. Take him!
Especially if you don't like history he is the teacher to take!
